name: Rewind The Crime
description:
Art made by Alex

[GO IN FULLSCREEN]

I had to upload this over 13 hours early, which means i cannot fix the issues present in this build, but you should still be able to complete it :)

This game is supposed to loosely follow the theme "rewind" but personally, i feel as if this hasn't really been met.

You play as a robot, who has previously stolen gold from a bank. 

Your job is to return it, and not get caught. If a guard gets too close, you lose. Unlabelled rooms: RECEPTION (glass front, little holes, carpet floor, key is on the wooden barrier.)

LOBBY: (this is the area with the pillars.)

This is my second game, so expect a lot of bugs and irritating gameplay. Its complete-able though. 

PRESS E to interact with objects. We were in a rush to complete this simple level near the end, so theres no sound, and no indication of items you need to pickup. However, these items are present and you just need to press "E" near them to activate them.

P.S Doors are temperamental - just keep trying...

Even if you dont enjoy the game, Thank you for giving it a try.
